languages.text: "Тс! Понимаю ваше желание выслужиться, но зачем так громко? Госпожа Зауэрбэк и без того колоритная личность, привлекающая внимание".

traits.locale_text: "Тс! Понимаю, хочется выслужиться перед старшим офицером, но зачем же так громко? Госпожа Зауэрбэк и без того колоритная личночть, привлекающая внимание. Хочешь, чтобы о нашем прибытии знали вообще все в палатах?"

languages.text: "Keep it down, will you? I understand your desire to curry favour, but do you have to do it so loudly? Mistress Sauerback is already a colourful, attention-grabbing character all by herself."
languages.original_text: "Тс! Понимаю ваше желание выслужиться, но зачем так громко? Госпожа Зауэрбэк и без того колоритная личность, привлекающая внимание".

traits.locale_text: "Hush! I understand your desire to curry favour, but why be so loud? Mistress Sauerback is already a colourful, attention-grabbing character."
"Hush! I understand your desire to curry favour, but why be so loud? Mistress Sauerback is already a colourful, attention-grabbing character."

languages.text: "Nicht so laut, ja? Ich verstehe Euren Wunsch, Euch gutzustellen, aber müsst Ihr das so laut tun? Es reicht schon, dass Herrin Sauerback derart penetrant auffallen und sich in den Mittelpunkt stellen will."
languages.original_text: "Keep it down, will you? I understand your desire to curry favour, but do you have to do it so loudly? Mistress Sauerback is already a colourful, attention-grabbing character all by herself."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht so laut, ja? Ich verstehe Euren Wunsch, Euch gutzustellen, aber müsst Ihr das so laut tun? Es reicht schon, dass Herrin Sauerback derart penetrant auffallen und sich in den Mittelpunkt stellen will."

languages.text: «Baja la voz, ¿quieres? Ya sé que estás deseando ganarte su favor, pero ¿tienes que gritar para ello? La maestra Sauerback ya es bastante colorida y llamativa por sus propios méritos».
languages.original_text: "Keep it down, will you? I understand your desire to curry favour, but do you have to do it so loudly? Mistress Sauerback is already a colourful, attention-grabbing character all by herself."

traits.locale_text: «Baja la voz, ¿quieres? Ya sé que estás deseando ganarte su favor, pero ¿tienes que gritar para ello? La maestra Sauerback ya es bastante colorida y llamativa por sus propios méritos».

languages.text: 「静かにしてくれないか？ご機嫌を取りたいのはわかるが、そんな大声でやる必要があるか？ザウアーバック女史は、一人であっても華やかで、注目を集める性格なんだ」
languages.original_text: "Keep it down, will you? I understand your desire to curry favour, but do you have to do it so loudly? Mistress Sauerback is already a colourful, attention-grabbing character all by herself."

traits.locale_text: 「静かにしてくれないか？ご機嫌を取りたいのはわかるが、そんな大声でやる必要があるか？ザウアーバック女史は、一人であっても華やかで、注目を集める性格なんだ」

languages.text: “你能不能小点声？我能理解你想拍马屁的心情，但你真的要这么大声吗？光是苏尔贝克女士一个人，就足以把周围人的目光全都吸引到她身上了。”
languages.original_text: "Keep it down, will you? I understand your desire to curry favour, but do you have to do it so loudly? Mistress Sauerback is already a colourful, attention-grabbing character all by herself."

traits.locale_text: “你能不能小点声？我能理解你想拍马屁的心情，但你真的要这么大声吗？光是苏尔贝克女士一个人，就足以把周围人的目光全都吸引到她身上了。”

languages.text: « Moins fort, voulez-vous ? Je comprends votre désir de vous faire bien voir, mais vous pourriez le faire un peu plus discrètement ? Maîtresse Sauerback est déjà bien assez bruyante pour deux. »
languages.original_text: "Keep it down, will you? I understand your desire to curry favour, but do you have to do it so loudly? Mistress Sauerback is already a colourful, attention-grabbing character all by herself."

traits.locale_text: « Moins fort, voulez-vous ? Je comprends votre désir de vous faire bien voir, mais vous pourriez le faire un peu plus discrètement ? Maîtresse Sauerback est déjà bien assez bruyante pour deux. »

languages.text: "Alçak sesle konuşsana! Yalakalık yapma derdinde olduğunun farkındayım ama bu kadar bağırmadan yapamaz mısın? Sauerback Hanım zaten başlı başına dikkat çeken, rengârenk bir insan."
languages.original_text: "Keep it down, will you? I understand your desire to curry favour, but do you have to do it so loudly? Mistress Sauerback is already a colourful, attention-grabbing character all by herself."
